summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Forty-six and Twenty Hundredths ($46.20) Dollars out of the general fund to pay the deficiency in the special fund created to pay the damages to certain lots, cause by the establishing of the grades and regrading of Denny Way, from Boren Avenue North to Eastlake Avenue, as provided in Ordinance No. 12258, approved April 5, 1905, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor, and repealing Ordinance No. 13588, entitled "An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Forty-six and Twenty Hundredths ($46.20) Dollars from the general fund to be paid Knut and Marie Halseth" etc. approved April 19, 1906.
